column1: Funeral services are set for 2:00 PM
column4: 2015 in the chapel of Fry & Gibbs Funeral Home with Rev. John Brown officiating. Burial will follow in Evergreen Cemetery. The family will receive friends from 7:00-8:00 PM
column5: Monday evening at the funeral home. Fry & Gibbs Funeral Home has charge of the arrangements.
